form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Ms. Hirono introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To amend title 38, United States Code, to allow the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to modify the hours of employment of physicians and physician assistants employed on a full-time basis by the Department of Veterans Affairs.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Department of Veterans Affairs Emergency Medical Staffing Recruitment and Retention Act.

section.header: Modification of hours of employment for physicians and physician assistants employed by the Department of Veterans Affairs
section.text: Section 7423(a) of title 38, United States Code, is amendedâ€”

paragraph.text: by striking (a) The hours and inserting (a)(1) Except as provided in paragraph (2), the hours; and
by adding at the end the following new paragraph:

The Secretary may modify the hours of employment for a physician or physician assistant appointed in the Administration under any provision of this chapter on a full-time basis to be more than or less than 80 hours in a biweekly pay period if the total hours of employment for such employee in a calendar year does not exceed 2,080 hours.
